name: Two Henries
description:
Meet Henry... and Henry. When two distinguished gentlemen share a name, they are naturally attached to each other. But what if the attachment gets literal? After a freak crumpet accident, Bottom Henry has swollen to Absolute Unit proportions, and it's up to Top Henry to guide his soulmate to a soothing cup of HxH Digestive Tea. 

Help Top Henry run and jump through the challenging Gentleman Mountains, while tactfully swinging Bottom Henry into tea crates, switches and teleporters in this physics based puzzle platformer. Twice the Henries, Double the fun!

-------------------------------

CONTROLS

ARROWS - Move

Z - Jump

R - Reset the current level

ENTER - Skip current level (if its too difficult or frustrating)

-------------------------------

Code /Design- Andy Napierkowski

Art - Lobsterblues

Music - ScottyRich
